name: Feroxa (Werewolf)
behaviour: Chases her target. She will transform into [[Feroxa (Killable Werewolf)|her killable werewolf form]] when she is at about half health.
strategy:
She cannot be damaged by any attacks. You must guide her over the [[Silvered Trap]]s. Drag [[Closed Silvered Trap]]s to the ground and use them to open them, at which point the silvered trap will become immobile and that have been placed on the floor laid by players. When she walks over these traps she will be damaged for 1000 health.

When she walks over 20 traps, she will transform into [[Feroxa (Killable Werewolf)|her killable werewolf form]].
